statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluator_id FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score, comments FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = '98765432-12ab-34cd-56ef-098765432112' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_score >= 90 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 80 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluator_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 80
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE comments LIKE '%excellent%' OR comments LIKE '%outstanding%'
SELECT MAX(performance_score), MIN(performance_score), AVG(performance_score) FROM employee_performance_evaluations
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE manager_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND manager_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM employment_laws WHERE law_name LIKE 'Labor%';
SELECT law_id, law_description FROM employment_laws ORDER BY law_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM employment_laws WHERE law_name LIKE '%safety%' AND law_description ILIKE '%health%';
SELECT employee_id, manager_id FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL AND evaluation_score < 50 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM employment_laws WHERE length(law_description) > 100 ORDER BY law_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE overall_rating > 4;
SELECT law_title FROM employment_laws WHERE law_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';

SELECT e.name, pr.overall_rating, er.law_title FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id JOIN employment_laws er ON pr.employee_id = er.law_id WHERE e.hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT e.name, pr.performance_notes FROM employees e LEFT JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'Finance';
SELECT e.name, e.department, pr.review_date FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE pr.overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY pr.review_date DESC;

SELECT e.name, pr.overall_rating, er.law_description FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id JOIN employment_laws er ON pr.employee_id = er.law_id WHERE e.department = 'IT' AND pr.overall_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_comments FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE review_rating > 4;
SELECT goal_description, goal_target_date FROM Goals WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT appraisal_result, appraisal_date FROM Appraisals ORDER BY appraisal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_department FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviews JOIN Employees ON PerformanceReviews.employee_id = Employees.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, goal_description, goal_target_date FROM Employees JOIN Goals ON Employees.employee_id = Goals.employee_id WHERE goal_target_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, performance_rating, feedback FROM performance_reviews WHERE performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_reviews FROM appraisal_cycles WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT e.employee_name, p.review_date, p.performance_rating, a.rating_name FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id JOIN appraisal_ratings a ON p.performance_rating = a.rating_id;

SELECT e.employee_name, p.review_date, ar.description, ef.feedback_text FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id JOIN appraisal_ratings ar ON p.performance_rating = ar.rating_id JOIN employee_feedback ef ON p.review_id = ef.review_id;

SELECT e.employee_name, p.review_date, p.performance_rating, a.rating_name, ef.feedback_text FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id JOIN appraisal_ratings a ON p.performance_rating = a.rating_id JOIN employee_feedback ef ON p.review_id = ef.review_id WHERE p.review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.review_date DESC;
